supporting_spans: When he was fourteen a whaling crew coveted the island’s spring and set fire to threaten the village; as squad leader he slipped aboard at night, smashed their launches and drove them off.
They must be patient. It was the most prudent plan. What, moreover, could ten defenceless men do against thirty well-armed savages?
reasoning: Contradiction (factual): The character Kai-Koumou does not exhibit the ferocity claimed in the evidence.

analysis.claim_text: When he was fourteen a whaling crew coveted the island’s spring and set fire to threaten the village; as squad leader he slipped aboard at night, smashed their launches and drove them off. A captured Spanish sailor, impressed by his ferocity, secretly taught him scraps of Spanish slang.

sub_claims.text: When he was fourteen a whaling crew coveted the island’s spring and set fire to threaten the village; as squad leader he slipped aboard at night, smashed their launches and drove them off.
A captured Spanish sailor, impressed by his ferocity, secretly taught him scraps of Spanish slang.

analysis.reasoning: Contradiction (factual): The character Kai-Koumou does not exhibit the ferocity claimed in the evidence.
